title: Goal
description: Describes the intended objective(s) for a patient, group or organization.(Based on HL7 FHIR Release 5 specifications)

xdm:identifier.title: Identifier
xdm:identifier.description: Business identifiers assigned to this goal by the performer or other systems which remain constant as the resource is updated and propagates from server to server.

xdm:lifecycleStatus.title: Lifecycle Status
xdm:lifecycleStatus.description: proposed | planned | accepted | active | on-hold | completed | cancelled | entered-in-error | rejected

xdm:achievementStatus.title: Achievement Status
xdm:achievementStatus.description: Describes the progression, or lack thereof, towards the goal against the target (in-progress | improving | worsening | no-change | achieved | sustaining | not-achieved | no-progress | not-attainable).

xdm:category.title: Category
xdm:category.description: Indicates a category the goal falls within. E.g. Treatment, dietary, behavioral, etc.

xdm:continuous.title: Continuous
xdm:continuous.description: After meeting the goal, ongoing activity is needed to sustain the goal objective.

xdm:priority.title: Priority
xdm:priority.description: Identifies the mutually agreed level of importance associated with reaching/sustaining the goal. e.g. high-priority | medium-priority | low-priority.

xdm:subject.title: Subject
xdm:subject.description: Identifies the patient, group or organization for whom the goal is being established.

xdm:startDate.title: Start Date
xdm:startDate.description: The date after which the goal should begin being pursued.

xdm:startCodeableConcept.title: Start Codeable Concept
xdm:startCodeableConcept.description: The event after which the goal should begin being pursued..

xdm:target.title: Target
xdm:target.description: Indicates what should be done by when.

xdm:measure.title: Measure
xdm:measure.description: The parameter whose value is being tracked.

xdm:detailQuantity.title: Detail Quantity
xdm:detailQuantity.description: The target Quantity to be achieved to signify the fulfillment of the goal.

xdm:detailRange.title: Detail Range
xdm:detailRange.description: The target Range to be achieved to signify the fulfillment of the goal.

xdm:detailCodeableConcept.title: Detail Codeable Concept
xdm:detailCodeableConcept.description: A CodeableConcept to be achieved to signify the fulfillment of the goal..

xdm:detailString.title: Detail String
xdm:detailString.description: The target value to be achieved to signify the fulfillment of the goal.

xdm:detailBoolean.title: Detail Boolean
xdm:detailBoolean.description: Boolean flag to indicate the fulfillment of the goal.

xdm:detailInteger.title: Detail Integer
xdm:detailInteger.description: The target value number to be achieved to signify the fulfillment of the goal.

xdm:detailRatio.title: Detail Ratio
xdm:detailRatio.description: The target value in ratio to be achieved to signify the fulfillment of the goal.

xdm:dueDate.title: Due Date
xdm:dueDate.description: Indicates the date after start by which the goal should be met.

xdm:dueDuration.title: Due Duration
xdm:dueDuration.description: Indicates the duration after start by which the goal should be met.

xdm:statusDate.title: Status Date
xdm:statusDate.description: Identifies when the current status. I.e. When initially created, when achieved, when cancelled, etc.

xdm:statusReason.title: Status Reason
xdm:statusReason.description: Captures the reason for the current status.

xdm:source.title: Source
xdm:source.description: Indicates whose goal this is - patient goal, practitioner goal, etc.

xdm:addresses.title: Addresses
xdm:addresses.description: The identified conditions and other health record elements that are intended to be addressed by the goal.

xdm:outccome.title: Outcome
xdm:outccome.description: Identifies the change (or lack of change) at the point when the status of the goal is assessed.
